PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProfileArbitraryHollowCore
PropertySetDef.Definition: This is a collection of geometric properties of hollow core section profiles of precast concrete elements, to be used in conjunction with IfcArbitraryProfileDefWithVoids when profile designation alone does not fulfill the information requirements.In all cases, the cores are symmetrically distributed on either side of the plank center line, irrespective of whether the number of cores is odd or even. For planks with a center core with different geometry to that of the other cores, provide the property CenterCoreSpacing. When the number of cores is even, no Center Core properties shall be asserted.Key chamfers and draft chamfer are all 45 degree chamfers.The CoreTopRadius and CoreBaseRadius parameters can be derived and are therefore not listed in the property set. They are shown to define that the curves are arcs. The parameters for the center core are the same as above, but with the prefix "Center".

PropertyDef.Name: OverallWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Overall width of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: OverallDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Overall depth of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: EdgeDraft
PropertyDef.Definition: Edge draft of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: DraftBaseOffset
PropertyDef.Definition: Draft base offset of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: DraftSideOffset
PropertyDef.Definition: Draft side offset of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: BaseChamfer
PropertyDef.Definition: Base chamfer of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: KeyDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Key depth of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: KeyHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Key height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: KeyOffset
PropertyDef.Definition: Key offset of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: BottomCover
PropertyDef.Definition: Bottom cover of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Core spacing of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreBaseHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Core base height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreMiddleHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Core middle height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreTopHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Core top height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreBaseWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Core base width of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreTopWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Core top width of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterCoreSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Center core spacing of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterCoreBaseHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Center core base height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterCoreMiddleHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Center core middle height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterCoreTopHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Center core top height of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterCoreBaseWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Center core base width of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterCoreTopWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Center core top width of the profile.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCores
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of cores.
